page.title: 03Housing N.of A580 at Worsley
page.content: {Roads}-There are 3 main roads running N. from A580 to meet A6 near Walkden. Each is a bus route giving access to Manchester,Wigan,Bolton & Eccles. {Housing-history}-Since the last war the area north of the railway and East of the colliery has been used for housing.Some houses(mainly terraced & semi-detached)existed pre-war.These are situated along the 3 main roads. {Modern housing}-Since 1955 2 estates of owner-occupied houses have been built near Ellenbrook Rd.& Walkden Rd. The"Ellenbrook"estate(built 1960-75) has detached & semi-detached bungalows & houses with gardens & garages.The Walkden Rd.estate begun on W.in '50's & extended E.by 1970.Here property is detached & semi-detached with gardens. {Communications}-All postal services are based in Walkden.There is no local post-office or telephone exchange.
